title: 162: The Spotted on Shelves Episode (Snacks Edition)
itunes:title: The Spotted on Shelves Episode (Snacks Edition)
description: In this week’s episode, Lisa and the gang are taste-testing a slew of snacks like spicy pickle bites, cauliflower bites, crumble bars, redesigned RX Bars, tortilla chips, and SO MUCH MORE! Plus, there’s not one, but two finds that score a perfect 10 on Lisa’s rating scale! Wait no more, push play now, then head on over to our Foodcast page for a list of all the products mentioned in the episode!
itunes:summary: Let’s get ready to SNACK! We recently tried a dozen treats and some you’ll want to run to the store and buy immediately!
itunes:author: Lisa Lillien
dc:creator: Lisa Lillien
